newsitem.title: CANADA: International Forest Products Q3 slim.
newsitem.headline: International Forest Products Q3 slim.

text.p: International Forest Products Ltd said late on Tuesday it earned C$211,000 or C$0.01 a share in the third quarter compared to earnings of C$586,000 or C$0.02 a share in the same period of 1995.
Sales in the third quarter were C$214.8 million, down from C$230.1 million the prior year.

For the first nine months of 1996, the forest products company lost C$11.2 million or C$0.31 a share. In the same period of 1995, it earned C$27.0 million or C$0.77 a share. Sales fell in the 1996 period to C$576.7 million from C$704.7 million the prior year.
